title: Happy Birthday, Kotori-chan!
detail_text: <:th_ch0003/>Hehe~, it was so great to have everyone here today to celebrate with me~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Fufu, it looks like everyone’s preparations paid off. Kotori-chan, happy birthday again!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Thank you, Honoka-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Hey, hey, Kotori-chan, we actually have some more celebrating to do......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Huh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Can we make a quick detour?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Of course. But I think we’ve already celebrated enough......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Now, hold on. We aren’t done celebrating you this year! Let’s go see what Umi-chan prepared for you!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Huh!? More celebrations...... How much?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>That’s a secret! But there’s a whole lot more! In order to wish you as happy a birthday as possible, she’s prepared a big surprise for you! Come on, let’s go!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
